import MethodEndpoint from "@theme/ApiExplorer/MethodEndpoint";
import ParamsDetails from "@theme/ParamsDetails";
import RequestSchema from "@theme/RequestSchema";

import OperationTabs from "@theme/OperationTabs";

<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Add room to user"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"post"}
  path={"/api/v1.0/users/{UserId}/rooms/{LocationRoomId}"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Adds a single room assignment to a user without affecting existing room assignments. Use this when incrementally assigning rooms rather than replacing the full list.

**Prerequisites**
1. **UserId** - Use [POST /api/v1.0/users](/docs/api/users/search-users) to locate the user. Extract `Items[].UserId`.
2. **LocationRoomId** - Use [POST /api/v2.0/locations/\{locationId\}/rooms](/docs/api/locations/query-location-rooms-by-location-id) to list rooms. Extract `Items[].LocationRoomId` (LocationId can be found via [GET /api/v1.0/locations/view](/docs/api/locations/get-all-site-locations-v-2)).

**Workflow Example**
1. Identify user: [POST /api/v1.0/users](/docs/api/users/search-users) → extract UserId.
2. Identify room: [POST /api/v2.0/locations/\{locationId\}/rooms](/docs/api/locations/query-location-rooms-by-location-id) → extract LocationRoomId.
3. POST this endpoint to add the room assignment.

**Minimal Required Fields**: UserId, LocationRoomId (path parameters)

**Notes**: Existing room assignments remain unchanged. Use DELETE on this same path to remove the assignment.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"name":"UserId","in":"path","required":true,"description":"User identifier.","schema":{"type":"string","format":"uuid"},"example":"51c89694-ae9f-f011-8e61-6045bd7991ab"},{"name":"LocationRoomId","in":"path","required":true,"description":"Room identifier to add.","schema":{"type":"string","format":"uuid"},"example":"a1b2c3d4-5678-90ab-cdef-123456789012"}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={undefined}
>
  
</RequestSchema>
